document.masterDocTitle: Description of a new species of Pentarthrum Wollaston (Coleoptera: Curculionidae: Cossoninae) from China with an annotated checklist to species of the World

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Description of a new species of Pentarthrum Wollaston (Coleoptera: Curculionidae: Cossoninae) from China with an annotated checklist to species of the World

bibRefCitation.author: Wollaston
bibRefCitation.refString: Wollaston, T. V. (1854) Description of a new genus and species of British Curculionidae. The Annals and Magazine of Natural History, 16, 129 - 131.

subSubSection.paragraph: Ref. : Annals and Magazine of Natural History ( 2 ) 14 ( 80 ): 129 .
